author: Niall Stanage
description: The Jeffrey Epstein saga is causing new problems for President Trump.  This time, it’s raising questions about the strategy he and his aides have adopted in denying any involvement in a book prepared for the deceased financier and sexual predator’s 50th birthday. The emphatic strategy was risky from the start — and now looks very…

description: A Minnesota man was charged with threatening to assault and kill a federal judge, the Department of Justice (DOJ) announced on Tuesday. description: New York City's congestion pricing scheme has resulted in a 12% decrease in cars entering Manhattan, as well as reduced gridlock, safer streets, and increased funding for public transportation.
title: 17.6M fewer vehicles entered Manhattan since congestion pricing launch: NY officials

description: Naomi Osaka's remarks about racism at the U.S. Open sparked a debate about how Americans view racism, with many feeling that people are too quick to accuse others of racism and that the Democrats need to recognize this in order to win elections.

District Court Judge Kristen D. Simmons said the individuals indicted “believe they were executing their constitutional right to seek redress” after attempting to overturn former President Biden’s 2020…
